main event: An elongated orange or yellowish object was observed waving and bobbing in the sky for about 25 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as elongated and resembling the size of a dime., The sighting occurred at night in clear weather with few clouds., The witness reported the object weaving and bobbing during its flight., The report indicates that the information was limited and insufficient for a thorough analysis., No photographs were present with the report.
